Package hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.algorithm.cegar

Class BasicArgAbstractor<S extends State,A extends Action,P extends Prec>

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.analysis.algorithm.cegar.BasicArgAbstractor<S,A,P>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Abstractor<P,ARG<S,A>>, ArgAbstractor<S,A,P>
public class BasicArgAbstractor<S extends State,A extends Action,P extends Prec> extends Object implements ArgAbstractor<S,A,P>
Basic implementation for the abstractor, relying on an ArgBuilder.
